-- =============================================================================
-- European Soccer Events
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================
 
-- This script will create an external table needed to load the data
-- transformed by Spark into the SQL Pool DB.

-- #############################################################################
-- DON'T FORGET TO CHANGE THE DATA LAKE NAME, URL AND PATH
-- DON'T FORGET TO CHOOSE BUILT-IN AND THE CORRECT DATABASE
-- #############################################################################

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Create Europe Soccer Events schema 'ese_Spark'
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'ese_External')
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [ese_External]');
GO

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Create objects needed for creating external tables
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'ParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [ParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'Main_DataLake_001_europesoccerevents') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [Main_DataLake_001_europesoccerevents] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://europesoccerevents@demomdwhdls001weu.dfs.core.windows.net'
	)
GO

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Create tables
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF EXISTS (SELECT object_id FROM sys.objects obj JOIN sys.schemas sch ON obj.schema_id = sch.schema_id WHERE obj.NAME = 'GameEvents' AND sch.name = 'ese_External' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE [ese_External].[GameEvents]
GO
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ese_External.GameEvents (
	[id_odsp] varchar(32),
	[id_event] varchar(32),
	[sort_order] int,
	[time] int,
	[event_type] int,
	[event_type_str] varchar(32),
	[event_type2] int,
	[event_type2_str] varchar(32),
	[side] int,
	[side_str] varchar(16),
	[event_team] varchar(128),
	[opponent] varchar(128),
	[player] varchar(128),
	[player2] varchar(128),
	[player_in] varchar(128),
	[player_out] varchar(128),
	[shot_place] int,
	[shot_place_str] varchar(64),
	[shot_outcome] int,
	[shot_outcome_str] varchar(64),
	[is_goal] int,
	[location] int,
	[location_str] varchar(64),
	[bodypart] int,
	[bodypart_str] varchar(64),
	[assist_method] int,
	[assist_method_str] varchar(64),
	[situation] int,
	[situation_str] varchar(64),
	[country_code] varchar(3),
	[time_bin] float
)
WITH (
	LOCATION = 'curated/game_events.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [Main_DataLake_001_europesoccerevents],
	FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormat]
)
GO
